text: Everyone can stop addressing [Name] as Master
[Name] you can take your elbows off the table now, have some manners!
You can touch the table again
[Name] can pronounce vowels again
[Name] can speak in their own accent again, have some respect!
Everyone can stop dancing to [Name]'s voice
[Name] can communicate normally again
Every can stop taking sips to [Name]'s voice
[Name] can take off that stupid hat!
[Name] can stop singing their every sentence now, give everyone's ears a break!
Everyone can stop meowing when [Name] speaks, weirdos
[Name] can stop talking like a robot
[Name] can stop speaking in a British accent, Brits out!
You can curse again, without risking having to sip
[Name] and [Name2] can let go of each other!
[Name], you're not captain anymore!
[Name], you're not the magician anymore
Speaking not like Yoda, you can. (You don't have to speak like Yoda anymore, that sentence is weird.)
[Name], no more hand massage for you
Everyone can stop following [Name]'s orders
Everyone can stop whispering again
[Name] can stop speaking in rhyme
[Name] can stop communicating in text talk, boomer
Everyone can speak in their own language again
Everyone can stop communicating in charades
Everyone can stop imitating animal sounds
[Name] can stop miming, sacre bleu!
Everyone can speak in their own accent again
[Name] can stop talking like a pirate
Everyone can speak in their own voice again
[Name], you can stop drinking every time the person to your right does, cop on.
[Name] and [Name2], you can have your birth names back now.
[Name] is no longer the designated DJ. Everyone can stop dancing.
[Name] can now use multi-syllable words.
[Name] can now stop completing every sentence with the word "banana".
[Name] can now take off their blindfold.
[Name] can now do things without asking [Name2]'s permission.
[Name] can now speak in the first person again.
[Name] can now stop making funny faces when they speak.
[Name] can now stop giving [Name2] compliments every time they speak.
[Name] can now stop doing dares from other players every time they move from their spot.
[Name] can drink with their dominant hand again.
[Name] can now drink from their own cup.
[Name] and [Name2] no longer have to swap seats when their names are mentioned.
[Name] can now speak in complete sentences.
[Name] can now use words that don't start with the letter "A".
[Name] can now use words that aren't related to food.
[Name] can now use words that aren't related to animals.
[Name] can now use words that are more than 3 syllables long.
Everyone can now speak normally.
